Html:
Hi,

In GrahpSharp.Sample project, TestWindow.xaml shows vertices as square. but, it seems not to describe code about the shapes.

How do I change the shapes of vertex and edges?

The Style Setter for the example application are defined inside the GraphSharp.Controls.Themes.Generic.XAML

There you can see the default style for the Sample application.

Enjoy!!
badang

Hi,

Thanks for the good work of your guys first.

I'm doing a project which integrates graph# into winform, and problem comes up that the style of the vertex and edges in my project does not obtain the "pretty face" as the "TestWindow.xaml" in the Sample project.

I searched for an answer and finally found this thread.

Thank Dear badang for telling about the thicks, but I'm wondering how to make it work. I will be grateful if you could give me a hand.

Thanks again!
